Fey Step.name: Fey Step
Fey Step.sourceRef: Player's Handbook, Heroes of the Fallen Lands
Fey Step.flavor: You step through the boundary between the planes, disappearing for a moment before reappearing somewhere else.

Sense Magic.name: Sense Magic
Sense Magic.flavor: You attune your senses to the magical world, and in a flash, nearby magic becomes as obvious as birdsong on the wind.
keywords: Personal   Effect: You sense the presence of magic within 10 squares of you as if you succeeded on an Arcana check to do so. You can then make an Arcana check as a free action to identify any revealed magical phenomena, conjurations, or zones.
Sense Magic.effect: You sense the presence of magic within 10 squares of you as if you succeeded on an Arcana check to do so. You can then make an Arcana check as a free action to identify any revealed magical phenomena, conjurations, or zones.

Eladrin Escape.name: Eladrin Escape
Eladrin Escape.flavor: Your enemy has but one chance to corner you. Wasting it gives you the opportunity to flee.
Eladrin Escape.trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack.

Recursive Thought.name: Recursive Thought
Recursive Thought.flavor: When you clear your mind, your affliction bounces back to your unsuspecting foe.
keywords: Special   Trigger: You save against a dazing or stunning effect.  Target: The enemy that subjected you to the effect  Effect: The target is subjected to the effect you saved against until the end of your next turn.
Recursive Thought.trigger: You save against a dazing or stunning effect.
Recursive Thought.target: The enemy that subjected you to the effect
Recursive Thought.effect: The target is subjected to the effect you saved against until the end of your next turn.

Spiral Dance Assault.name: Spiral Dance Assault
Spiral Dance Assault.flavor: You strike and dance away, only to reappear at your enemyâ€™s side.
Spiral Dance Assault.trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee attack on your turn.
Spiral Dance Assault.effect: You teleport to a square adjacent to the enemy.
Spiral Dance Assault.special: You can use this power only once per round.
